author: pcaversaccio
content: I hope it's ok ask here; I saw that you updated the JSON-RPC website; what sucks is that I cannot have a direct link to a specific method now, eg https://ethereum.github.io/execution-apis/api-documentation#eth_estimateGas. Direct links to a method is super valuable for sharing and also for docs. Would it be possible to add support for links directly to methods
